commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Rinako, Shizuko, sorry to keep you waiting!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You're finally here.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: And 30 minutes late.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, but if you round it to the nearest hour, I'm right on time!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: What kind of logic is that?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Maybe you need another study session. Rina-chan Board says, "Knives out."

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What?! Anything but that!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Then make sure you're on time. What kept you so long?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I overslept!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Zero shame...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It's hard to get angry when you're so upfront about it...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's the spirit! School idols must be all smiles! Frowny faces are a big no-no!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Not a thing in the world can get you down, can it?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Giggle* Aw, thanks!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Was that a compliment?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Not exactly...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, Karin just texted me.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: What does it say?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, wow! Look!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What is it? Aww, I'm so jealous! They look like they're having so much fun!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: An update from the happy campers, huh?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: They're really hitting it off with the μ's girls. I wish I was there...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Maybe we should've changed plans and said we wanted to go to Numazu too.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: They're chowing down on seafood.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'm SO jealous!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Now, now, let's forget about the camp. We can have fun here too!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah, let's do that. Rina-chan Board says, "Totally excited!"

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: R-Right! We'll have so much fun they'll be kicking themselves for missing out!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: So, what should we do?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, how about a play? There's one that I've had my eye on being performed at a nearby theater. It could be quite educational.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Booooo! None of that educational stuff today!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: What?! But it could help with our school idol activities!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I know you! You're a super-serious student, so you always wanna go to plays or whatever looks useful for school idol practice, but there's no work allowed today! Only play!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: So no going to places you normally go to. Okay?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Then what should we do?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We'll figure something out!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: So you had nothing planned...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You don't need a plan for everything! That'd be so lame! I'll teach you how fun it is to live life off the rails!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Um. If we don't have anywhere planned, then I wanna go to the aquarium.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah, I like the sound of that! You cool with that, Shizuko?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: The aquarium? I haven't been there in so long. Yeah, let's go!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Then aquarium, here we come!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Wow. There are so many fish!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well, duh! We're at an aquarium!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I've never been to an aquarium before.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Really?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's full of fish that I've seen in books and videos. I'm so happy. Rina-chan Board says, "Starry-eyed."

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Do you like fish, Rinako?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I like the pretty and cute ones.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: They really are pretty, aren't they? Oh, if you get up close like this, it feels like you're in the water with them.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: This kinda thing is pretty fun from time to time. I wish I could swim like a little fishy!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: They all look like they're having such a good time swimming around.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh! I saw this fish on TV the other day! It's so pretty!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Tropical fish are so cute with their bright colors.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah, I wish I could swim with them too.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We should all go hang out at the beach one day!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: We should! Oh, look! That colorful fish looks like Karin. It has such a fancy pattern.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: In that case, that fish that's not moving can be Kanata!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Her spitting image.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh! Over there! It looks like there's a penguin show!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I wanna see the penguins!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Rinako looks like she's really enjoying herself. I'm glad we came!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Chuckle* Me too. It's been so long since I've had a day to just hang out like this, so I'm really having fun. You were right. You don't need a plan to have a good time!
